analysis.description:
BRANDCOIN.distributeInitialFunds (/unique_chucks/26/0xe73dc97b050e3b7afa5aea0b0ba192712162899b.sol#395-414) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-this.transfer(founderWallet,totalSupply_ * 15 / 100) (/unique_chucks/26/0xe73dc97b050e3b7afa5aea0b0ba192712162899b.sol#400-402)
	-this.transfer(earlyBackersWallet,totalSupply_ * 5 / 100) (/unique_chucks/26/0xe73dc97b050e3b7afa5aea0b0ba192712162899b.sol#402-405)
	-this.transfer(teamWallet,totalSupply_ * 15 / 100) (/unique_chucks/26/0xe73dc97b050e3b7afa5aea0b0ba192712162899b.sol#405-406)
	-this.transfer(bountyAffiliateWallet,totalSupply_ * 5 / 100) (/unique_chucks/26/0xe73dc97b050e3b7afa5aea0b0ba192712162899b.sol#406-409)
	-this.transfer(reserveWallet,totalSupply_ * 10 / 100) (/unique_chucks/26/0xe73dc97b050e3b7afa5aea0b0ba192712162899b.sol#410-413)

BRANDCOIN.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0xe73dc97b050e3b7afa5aea0b0ba192712162899b.sol#421-486) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-this.transfer(msg.sender,amountOfBRApurchased) (/unique_chucks/26/0xe73dc97b050e3b7afa5aea0b0ba192712162899b.sol#475-477)

Reentrancy in BRANDCOIN.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0xe73dc97b050e3b7afa5aea0b0ba192712162899b.sol#421-486):
	External calls:
	- this.transfer(msg.sender,amountOfBRApurchased) (/unique_chucks/26/0xe73dc97b050e3b7afa5aea0b0ba192712162899b.sol#475-477)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allParticipants (/unique_chucks/26/0xe73dc97b050e3b7afa5aea0b0ba192712162899b.sol#480)
	- participantToBRAbought (/unique_chucks/26/0xe73dc97b050e3b7afa5aea0b0ba192712162899b.sol#481-483)
	- participantToEtherSpent (/unique_chucks/26/0xe73dc97b050e3b7afa5aea0b0ba192712162899b.sol#483-486)
